content: For the people following this stream, I've posted https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/136281-t-lang.2Fwg-unsafe-code-guidelines/topic/unstable.20features.20deliberately.20unsafe.2Funsound, which I think would interest you as well: basically it's not because one uses nightly that the safety bets ought to be off: tools such as #![forbid(unsafe_code)] ought to remain able to protect crates, even nightly ones, from introducing UB
